PSCT.Base: (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Spell; Special Summon 1 "Witchcrafter" monster from your hand, except "Witchcrafter Edel". You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Spellcaster monster in your GY, except "Witchcrafter Edel"; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Witchcrafter Edel" once per turn.
